resources.string: "Before planning a weight-gain or weight-loss diet, please consult your doctor. Click to view physicians near you in Kanpur."
"BMI is a quick and easy way to find if you have a healthy weight or if you should try to burn some calories ^w^"
"Great! Your BMI indicates you have a healthy weight."
"Oh No! Your BMI indicates you have a little more weight than expected! Don't worry, just a few calories to burn ^_^"
"Oh No! You have an unhealthy weight, please consult your doctor and plan a diet as given next. You have got this!"
"Oh no! You have dangerously low weight.! Please consult your doctor and plan a diet as given next. You have got this!"
"An important part of a healthy lifestyle is to consider how much calories and nutrients you must consume. Click here to view what nutrients you should consume"
"Oh No! You have a slightly lower weight than expected! Don't worry that means more food to eat ^_^"
"Planning a healthy and tasty meal can be a challenging task.Need help planning an Indian diet? Click here to view some meal options and their attributes."
